sentences.sentence: The horse gave a loud neigh.
Hwin, though shaking all over, gave a strange little neigh, and trotted across to the lion.
sentences.translation: 赫温虽然浑身发抖，却发出一声奇怪的低低的嘶鸣，跨着小步向狮子走过去。

sentences.sentence: Horses on the bus sing. Neigh! Neigh! Neigh!
sentences.translation: 马在公共汽车上唱歌。嘞！嘞！嘞！
